name: Grove Island
description:
Trapped on a small island, you are being stalked by Lovecraftian and Cryptid entities but you must keep your fires alight while you try to search the island for anything useful...

Controls:

WASD to move, Shift to sprint, Crtl to crouch, E to interact, right click to zoom, and ESC to exit while in game.

- Keep your campfire and torch lit, if both go out, who knows what may be bold enough to come for you.

- Search the Island to collect relics.

- Be wary of those who are watching from the shadows.

Hope you all enjoy EightyBit Games' first game! All feedback is welcomed!
